com.mozium.core.session

Class ExecutionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mozium.core.session.ExecutionManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MoziumSuiteExecutionListener

    public abstract class ExecutionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manage the the lifecycle of an execution session of tests. It is an implementation listener of the TestNG. It is the entry point for each execution. It manage the concurrency of the thread execution when launching parallel execution of tests.
    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    mba
